SteamGames.name: Snood
SteamGames.short_description: Forget Life, Play SNOOD!

SteamGames.name: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon
SteamGames.short_description: Thousands of giant insects and aliens once again ravage the earth, and only the Earth Defense Force can stop them.

Name: emily archer and the curse of tutankhamun

SteamGamesSales.Name: Emily Archer and the Curse of Tutankhamun

SteamGames.name: Emily Archer and the Curse of Tutankhamun
SteamGames.short_description: Lady Archer is invited to Egypt to see the priceless treasure of King Tutankhamun by her friend Lord Carnarvon. She arrives to find her dear friend murdered and the mask of Tutankhamun stolen. Collect evidence to solve the murder in this hidden object game!

SteamGames.name: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
SteamGames.short_description: The first hi-res 2D fighter from the creators of the Guilty Gear series! BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters participate in a duel.

SteamGames.name: FIREBALL
SteamGames.short_description: "FIREBALL" is a physics-based platformer where you can experience the satisfaction of mastering strategies and improving your skills.

SteamGames.name: Hogs of War
SteamGames.short_description: Hogs of War is a turn-based tactical warfare game. Take turns controlling members of your squad of hogs to engage in combat with the opposition based on World War 1. With 3D graphics, vehicles, a career-based single-player mode, and voice-over (narration and for characters) by British comedian Rik Mayall.

SteamGames.name: Sudeki
SteamGames.short_description: Sudeki, a world torn apart into light, shadow and dark. Rent asunder by deceit and betrayal, the land cries out for a peace that only four united heroes can bring. Beyond the protective walls of Illumina Castle lie miles of pastoral, rolling countryside, though once a serene landscape, the Aklorian forces have transformed the countryside...

SteamGames.name: Aqua Panic!
SteamGames.short_description: After a violent tropical cyclone, the fish, shrimp, octopuses and other sea creatures find themselves flung out of the water… There's not a minute to lose! Use original tools to guide them to freedom! You'll need to think hard and act fast to save them all!

SteamGames.name: Crazy Chicken Tales
SteamGames.short_description: Prepare for the wildest ride of your life! Join Moorhuhn and his friends on their greatest adventure searching for the Forsaken Castle of lore.

SteamGames.name: Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes
SteamGames.short_description: From the creators of the award winning games “The Whispered World” and “Deponia” comes this extraordinary game Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes.

SteamGames.name: Dark Rift
SteamGames.short_description: According to Legend, When this Universe Was Created, A Master Key was Forged to Lock Away All Ancient Secrets and Infinite Powers The Cosmos Had to Offer.

SteamGames.name: Deathtrap Dungeon
SteamGames.short_description: Built by a mad baron to bring notoriety to his town, only the brave or foolish would dare to enter Deathtrap Dungeon. Fabulous riches await the victor. Many adventurers have tried - none have come out alive… As Red Lotus, the alluring assassin, or Chaindog, the savage warrior, you must battle your way to the heart of the dungeon and slay...

SteamGames.name: Song of the Deep
SteamGames.short_description: From the creators of Ratchet & Clank, Song of the Deep is a metroidvania-style action-adventure game following a young girl’s quest into the unknown to find her missing father. It combines underwater discovery, skill, and suspense with a powerful story.

SteamGames.name: Worms Blast
SteamGames.short_description: Fall in line for fast, furious fire fights with Worms™ Blast. Your mission: launch your worm marine into hostile waters and blast your way to survival through intense puzzle action! Take the big chunk of puzzle-styled gameplay and slice into 60 fun-sized missions.

SteamGames.name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior
SteamGames.short_description: As a Ghost Warrior, an elite sniper in a highly trained special ops unit, your unique skills in the art of stalking, target detection, surveillance and shooting accuracy will determine mission success.

SteamGames.name: The Cube
SteamGames.short_description: The cube is the best digital representation of the 70's iconic Magic cube. You may pick different sizes from 2x2, 3x3, 4x4 and 5x5, all of this while playing at the beat of great music.

SteamGames.name: Blood Bowl: Legendary Edition
SteamGames.short_description: Inspired by the Warhammer Fantasy world, Blood Bowl is an ultra-violent combination of strategy and sports games. The Legendary Edition features 20 playable races, including 11 that are totally new, each offering its own game style! Make a competitive team, train it and buy the best equipment.

SteamGames.name: Sid Meier's Civilization IV
SteamGames.short_description: With over 6 million units sold and unprecedented critical acclaim from fans and press around the world, Sid Meier's Civilization is recognized as one of the greatest PC game franchises of all-time. Now, Sid Meier and Firaxis Games will take this incredibly fun and addictive game to new heights by adding new ways to play and win, new...

Name: brothers in arms: road to hill 30

SteamGamesSales.Name: Brothers In Arms: Road to Hill 30

SteamGames.name: Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30
SteamGames.short_description: Based on a true story. Set during the famous airdrop before the invasion at Normandy, where Sgt. Matt Baker and his squad of 101st Airborne Paratroopers were scattered over the French countryside.

SteamGames.name: Kingdom Under Fire: Heroes
SteamGames.short_description: The cult hit Kingdom Under Fire saga continues on PC in glorious HD. Control seven new heroes across fifty brutal missions of hybrid hack n’ slash action and strategy. Crush your foes, hoard their treasure, and upgrade your forces for the next battle.

Name: captain morgane and the golden turtle

SteamGamesSales.Name: Captain Morgane and the Golden Turtle

SteamGames.name: Captain Morgane and the Golden Turtle
SteamGames.short_description: A place where pirates roamed the seas looking for treasure, and where one innocent 8 year old girl grew up to become the most famous Pirate of the Caribbean! From an early age, Morgane Castillo was a confident and feisty girl, playing with her friends and getting into scraps on Bounty Island.

SteamGames.name: Cars
SteamGames.short_description: Become a Badland Envoy. Gather your crew, arm your rides, and travers the desolated wastelands filled with danger, high octane destruction, and fast paced chases. Manage expeditions in tactical mode or take direct control over the action.

SteamGames.name: Cars Toon: Mater's Tall Tales
SteamGames.short_description: Cars Toon: Mater's Tall Tales is inspired by Disney/Pixar's wildly popular animated shorts of the same name. Cars Toon: Mater's Tall Tales is part of the Mania! video game franchise, featuring fast-paced, multiplayer, family fun.

SteamGames.name: Sonic Lost World
SteamGames.short_description: When the Deadly Six threaten to destroy his world, Sonic’s new moves & power-ups are the only way to defeat them before it’s too late!

SteamGames.name: Disciples III: Renaissance
SteamGames.short_description: Disciples III: Renaissance is the next title in the award-winning Disciples series and represents a leap forward in the evolution of the turn-based strategy RPG genre.

SteamGames.name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger
SteamGames.short_description: G'day, Mate. Explore the wilds of Australia with TY the Tasmanian Tiger, the charming Aussie platformer.

SteamGames.name: Deus Ex: Invisible War
SteamGames.short_description: Approximately 20 years after the events depicted in Deus Ex, The World is only beginning to recover from a Catastrophic worldwide depression. In the Chaotic period of recovery, several religious and political factions see an opportunity to re-shape a worldwide government to their agendas, understanding that the right moves now could...

SteamGames.name: Big Mutha Truckers 2
SteamGames.short_description: Ma Jackson, Hick State County's most infamous trucker, has been incarcerated on charges of tax evasion, 7,973 parking tickets, and six counts of being a comedy stereotype! Imprisoned, Ma's only hope lies with her kids. It's up to them to locate 6 members of the jury that are to try Ma and bribe them.

SteamGames.name: XCOM: Enemy Unknown
SteamGames.short_description: The XCOM: Enemy Unknown - Slingshot Pack is Now Available!

SteamGames.name: Blades of Time
SteamGames.short_description: Ayumi, the gorgeous gun and sword-wielding treasure hunter, sets out on a journey to an ancient island in search of new adventures. While rich in bounty, the island is also filled with the magic of Chaos, being at the same time home to blood thirsty monsters.

SteamGames.name: Battlezone
SteamGames.short_description: Strap into the cockpit of the Cobra – the most powerful tank ever built – and experience first-person tank combat across neon-scarred sci-fi landscapes in an explosive campaign for 1-4 players – now playable with or without a VR device!

SteamGames.name: Clockwork Empires
SteamGames.short_description: Take on the role of a Colonial Bureaucrat sent forth by the Clockwork Empire to build a Frontier Colony. Design houses & workshops to feed the Ravenous Maw of Industry, manage a uniquely unruly population, avoid cannibalism & monsters, and make Important Decisions for the glory of the Empire!

SteamGames.name: The Inner World
SteamGames.short_description: The Inner World – A 2D-Point’n’Click Adventure Together with the help of the mysterious thief Laura, his best intentions and no clue whatsoever, Robert sets off on his adventure to discover the secret of the wind's disappearance. Will the young adventurer be able to save his world?

SteamGames.name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
SteamGames.short_description: Experience what it’s like to be Batman and face off against Gotham's greatest villians. Explore every inch of Arkham Asylum and roam freely on the infamous island.

SteamGames.name: Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee
SteamGames.short_description: Selected by the fickle finger of fate, Abe™, floor-waxer first class for RuptureFarms, was catapulted into a life of adventure when he overheard plans by his boss, Molluck the Glukkon™, to turn Abe and his fellow Mudokons into Tasty Treats as part of a last-ditch effort to rescue Molluck's failing meat-packing empire.

SteamGames.name: Goat Simulator
SteamGames.short_description: Goat Simulator is the latest in high-tech Goat Simulation technology.

SteamGames.name: Iridion 3D
SteamGames.short_description: Iridion 3D is a fast paced 3-D action game that places the player in space as an interstellar prospector returning to Earth after the exploration of the distant Orion System. Upon entering the Earth's gravitational field, it is revealed that the Earth has been invaded by the Iridion Empire.

SteamGames.name: Sniper Elite V2
SteamGames.short_description: In the dark days of the end of World War Two amidst the ruins of Berlin, one bullet can change history…

SteamGames.name: Legend of Mana
SteamGames.short_description: The HD Remaster of Legend of Mana is coming to Steam. Meet a colorful cast of characters, use the unique "Land Make" System to build the World Map, and square off against fearsome monsters in the vibrant world of Fa’Diel.
